description: Elliot is a 21 year old college student, who we met at a local burger joint, where he works part-time to help pay for all those 'stupid credit cards' he maxed out when he was a bit younger.He's a sophomore majoring in social science and says he enjoy spending time with his girlfriend, Aimee.He's packing heat... and once you get a view of what he's hiding inside of his pants, you'll understand what we're talking aboutSo ENJOY Elliot as he enjoys himself in front of the laptop, on the chair, and watch him spew his load all over himself while he lies on the bed.
title: Elliot
